name: color-palette-maker-react
description: Color Palette Maker - React SPA for extracting color palettes from images
author: sbecker11

scripts.start: npx kill-port 3000 && node scripts/run-with-venv.js node server.js
scripts.dev:server: npx kill-port 3000 && node scripts/run-with-venv.js nodemon server.js
scripts.test: cd client && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test:coverage: cd client && npm run lint && npm run test:coverage
scripts.start:open: npm run start & npx wait-on -t 60000 http://localhost:3000/api/config && npm run open:app
scripts.build:with-coverage: npm run build && npm run test:coverage
